A fix has been integrated to not allow an update to a bundle that is installed 
by reference to the same referenced directory.  A bundle exception will be 
thrown indicating that the referenced directory is the same.

If you do a Bundle.update() on a bundle object that is installed by reference 
you will now get a BundleException.  To update a bundle installed by reference 
you must update it to a new referenced directory.  This can be done with the 
following code.

Bundle.update(
    new URL("reference:file:/myBundles/theNewBundleDir/").openStream());

The same thing can be done at the osgi> console with the following command:

update <bundleid> "reference:file:/myBundles/theNewBundleDir/"
